 with gold printed label
 The brand \u0027Mitrailleuse\u0027 is inscribed on the case. It is slightly rusty on the right.

  subject_terms_1: tailors Peranakan needles (piercing tools) sewing tools

  sgcool_label_text: This case of needles was used to store needles used in nyonya needlework. The brand ‘Mitrailleuse’ is inscribed on the case.. Needles used for beadwork are nearly identical to those utilised in embroidery. Since needles are made of iron and vulnerable to rust in the region’s humidity
 they were packed in silver foils in bundles of ten
 before being placed into small
 cylindrical metal containers. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses
 working from home as she did not have a shop.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a needle case. It is black, with gold printed label, The brand 'Mitrailleuse' is inscribed on the case. It is slightly rusty on the right.

metadata.subject_terms_3: Vanishing trade Textile art and design
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This case of needles was used to store needles used in nyonya needlework. The brand ‘Mitrailleuse’ is inscribed on the case.. Needles used for beadwork are nearly identical to those utilised in embroidery. Since needles are made of iron and vulnerable to rust in the region’s humidity, they were packed in silver foils in bundles of ten, before being placed into small, cylindrical metal containers. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses, working from home as she did not have a shop.
